Sentencas: One of the main challenges for wide-spread utilization of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) power systems is how to achieve high electrical efficiency without increasing the degradation rate of the fuel cells.
Titulo: Feedforward-feedback control of a solid oxide fuel cell power system

Sentencas: To run the SOFC power system at high efficiency over a long period of time, properly designed controllers are indispensable.
Titulo: Feedforward-feedback control of a solid oxide fuel cell power system

Sentencas: Although a number of various approaches to control SOFC have been proposed so far, it seems that the design of control system, along with simple tuning procedure, has not been treated in a consistent manner.
Titulo: Feedforward-feedback control of a solid oxide fuel cell power system

Sentencas: This issue is addressed in the present paper resulting in a feedforward-feedback control structure.
Titulo: Feedforward-feedback control of a solid oxide fuel cell power system

Sentencas: The feedforward part is based on the stoichiometry of electro-oxidation, reforming and combustion reactions, which allow immediate response to variable current demand.
Titulo: Feedforward-feedback control of a solid oxide fuel cell power system

Sentencas: The feedback part performs additional fine adjustment of fuel and air supply in order to minimize the undesired system temperatures variations.
Titulo: Feedforward-feedback control of a solid oxide fuel cell power system

Sentencas: The selection of pairings of manipulated and controlled variables for control is based on physical knowledge of the system.
Titulo: Feedforward-feedback control of a solid oxide fuel cell power system

Sentencas: Input/output pairing for single-loop feedback control is assessed by the relative gain analysis.
Titulo: Feedforward-feedback control of a solid oxide fuel cell power system

Sentencas: An efficient procedure for tuning the parameters of the feedback controllers is suggested, relying on simple open-loop step responses of the system.
Titulo: Feedforward-feedback control of a solid oxide fuel cell power system

Sentencas: The proposed low-level control is assessed on a detailed physical model of a 2.5 kW SOFC power system by simulating two nonstationary load regimes.
Titulo: Feedforward-feedback control of a solid oxide fuel cell power system

Sentencas: Simulations show that the control provides a robust operation under large load variations while meeting the operating constraints.
Titulo: Feedforward-feedback control of a solid oxide fuel cell power system

Sentencas: Due to its simplicity, the control is feasible for implementation on a real SOFC system.
Titulo: Feedforward-feedback control of a solid oxide fuel cell power system
